verses.text: \w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w pass|strong="H0935"\w*, \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* certain \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w stood|strong="H3320"\w* \w before|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Satan|strong="H7854"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w stood|strong="H3320"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* sight,

\w That|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Satan|strong="H7854"\w*: Whence comest thou? \w And|strong="H1980"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w* \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w I|strong="H2088"\w* \w have|strong="H0776"\w* \w gone|strong="H1980"\w* round \w about|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w walked|strong="H1980"\w* \w through|strong="H1980"\w* \w it|strong="H1980"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Satan|strong="H7854"\w*: Hast thou considered \w my|strong="H7760"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w Job|strong="H0347"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w there|strong="H0369"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w none|strong="H0369"\w* \w like|strong="H3644"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* simple, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w upright|strong="H3477"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* fearing \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* avoiding \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w still|strong="H5750"\w* keeping \w his|strong="H3068"\w* innocence? \w But|strong="H3588"\w* thou hast \w moved|strong="H5496"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w* \w against|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w should|strong="H0376"\w* afflict \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w without|strong="H0369"\w* \w cause|strong="H2600"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w Satan|strong="H7854"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Skin|strong="H5785"\w* \w for|strong="H1157"\w* \w skin|strong="H5785"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w a|strong="H5414"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* hath \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w for|strong="H1157"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w life|strong="H5315"\w*:

\w But|strong="H0518"\w* \w put|strong="H7971"\w* \w forth|strong="H7971"\w* thy \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w touch|strong="H5060"\w* \w his|strong="H7971"\w* \w bone|strong="H6106"\w* \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w his|strong="H7971"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w then|strong="H7971"\w* thou shalt gee \w that|strong="H3808"\w* \w he|strong="H0518"\w* \w will|strong="H3027"\w* \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* thee \w to|strong="H0413"\w* thy \w face|strong="H6440"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Satan|strong="H7854"\w*: \w Behold|strong="H2005"\w* \w be|strong="H3027"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* thy \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, \w but|strong="H0389"\w* \w yet|strong="H0389"\w* \w save|strong="H5315"\w* \w his|strong="H8104"\w* \w life|strong="H5315"\w*.

\w So|strong="H3318"\w* \w Satan|strong="H7854"\w* \w went|strong="H3318"\w* \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* \w from|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w presence|strong="H6440"\w* \w Of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w struck|strong="H5221"\w* \w Job|strong="H0347"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H5221"\w* \w very|strong="H5704"\w* grievous \w ulcer|strong="H7451"\w*, \w from|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w sole|strong="H3709"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w foot|strong="H7272"\w* \w even|strong="H5704"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* top \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w head|strong="H6936"\w*:

\w And|strong="H3427"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w a|strong="H3947"\w* \w potsherd|strong="H2789"\w* \w and|strong="H3427"\w* scraped \w the|strong="H3947"\w* corrupt matter, \w sitting|strong="H3427"\w* \w on|strong="H3427"\w* \w a|strong="H3947"\w* dunghill.

\w And|strong="H0430"\w* \w his|strong="H2388"\w* \w wife|strong="H0802"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w him|strong="H4191"\w*: Dost thou \w still|strong="H5750"\w* \w continue|strong="H5750"\w* \w in|strong="H0430"\w* thy simplicity? \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0430"\w* \w he|strong="H0430"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w*: Thou hast; \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* \w like|strong="H3808"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w foolish|strong="H5036"\w* \w women|strong="H5036"\w*: \w if|strong="H2398"\w* \w we|strong="H3605"\w* \w have|strong="H1571"\w* \w received|strong="H6901"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w things|strong="H3605"\w* \w at|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* hand \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w why|strong="H3808"\w* \w should|strong="H0559"\w* \w we|strong="H3605"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w receive|strong="H6901"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*? \w In|strong="H0413"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w these|strong="H2063"\w* \w things|strong="H3605"\w* \w Job|strong="H0347"\w* \w did|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w sin|strong="H2398"\w* \w with|strong="H0413"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w lips|strong="H8193"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H8085"\w* \w when|strong="H8085"\w* \w Jobâ€™s|strong="H0347"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w friends|strong="H7453"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w had|strong="H0376"\w* befallen \w him|strong="H5921"\w*, \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w one|strong="H0376"\w* \w from|strong="H0935"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w own|strong="H0376"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w*, Alphas \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Themanite, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* Baldad \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Suhite, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* Sophar \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Naamathite|strong="H5284"\w*. \w For|strong="H5921"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w had|strong="H0376"\w* \w made|strong="H3259"\w* \w an|strong="H0935"\w* \w appointment|strong="H3259"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w* \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w visit|strong="H0935"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w comfort|strong="H5162"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w And|strong="H8064"\w* \w when|strong="H0376"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w had|strong="H0376"\w* \w lifted|strong="H5375"\w* \w up|strong="H5375"\w* \w their|strong="H5375"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w afar|strong="H7350"\w* \w off|strong="H5921"\w*, \w they|strong="H5921"\w* knew \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w*, \w and|strong="H8064"\w* \w crying|strong="H1058"\w* \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w wept|strong="H1058"\w*, \w and|strong="H8064"\w* rending \w their|strong="H5375"\w* garments \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w sprinkled|strong="H2236"\w* \w dust|strong="H6083"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H5375"\w* \w heads|strong="H7218"\w* towards \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0776"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w sat|strong="H3427"\w* \w with|strong="H0854"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w ground|strong="H0776"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w nights|strong="H3915"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w no|strong="H0369"\w* \w man|strong="H0369"\w* \w spoke|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w his|strong="H7200"\w* \w grief|strong="H1697"\w* \w was|strong="H0369"\w* \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w great|strong="H1431"\w*.
